net.edzard.kinetic

Class Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.edzard.kinetic.Frame

  • public class Frame
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates timing information. Used for custom drawing functions. Necessary for properly timed animations.
    Author:
    Ed
